Publication Title: Opa1 and Drp1 reciprocally regulate cristae morphology, ETC function, and NAD<sup>+</sup> regeneration in KRas-mutant lung adenocarcinoma
Publication Keywords: Mitochondria, Cancer, Fusion, Nad, Cristae, Kras, Fission, Drp1, Opa1, Etc, Cp: Cancer
Publication Authors: Dane T Sessions, Kee-Beom Kim, Jennifer A Kashatus, Nikolas Churchill, Kwon-Sik Park, Marty W Mayo, Hiromi Sesaki, David F Kashatus
Publication Abstract: Oncogenic KRas activates mitochondrial fission through Erk-mediated phosphorylation of the mitochondrial fission GTPase Drp1. Drp1 deletion inhibits tumorigenesis of KRas-driven pancreatic cancer, but the role of mitochondrial dynamics in other Ras-driven malignancies is poorly defined.
